[Falcon's Cloud Ltd](https://www.falconscloud.co.uk/)
===========
Falcon's Cloud Ltd is a registered business in the United Kingdom that aims to provide affordable Virtual Machines with simplicity and excellent customer support.

## Technical Features
* Solid State Storage
* KVM Virtualisation
* Located in London, England
* DDoS Mitigation
* Up to 1Gbps connection  

---


Hummingbird
========
* 1 vCore
* 512MB RAM
* 6GB SSD Storage
* Unlimited Traffic (Limited to 1Gbps, guaranteed 250Mbps)
* 1 IPv4 Address

**£1.32 GBP ~ $1.74 USD /Month** - Discounted price with code (30% Off): **ZZRJJ82INN**
[**Buy Now!**](https://falcons.cloud/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)
Standard price: £1.89 GBP ~ $2.40 USD /Month

---

* 1 vCore
* 1GB RAM

* 1 IPv4 Address

* 2 vCore
* 2GB RAM

**£3.59 GBP ~ $4.74 USD /Month** - Discounted price with code (40% Off): **9E8SMRQ49Y**
[**Buy Now!**](https://falcons.cloud/cart.php?a=add&pid=10)

## Operating Systems
* CentOS 7 (64 bit)
* CentOS 6 (64 bit)
* Debain 9 (64 bit)
* Ubuntu 16.04 (64 bit)
* Ubuntu 18.04.1 (64 bit)
* Fedora Server (64 bit)
More are available upon request.
